title: Everybody Dance (video game)
text:
Everybody Dance (also known as DanceStar Party in Europe) is a <a href="2011%20in%20video%20gaming">2011</a> competitive <a href="dance">dance</a> <a href="video%20game">game</a> developed by <a href="London%20Studio">London Studio</a> and published by <a href="Sony%20Computer%20Entertainment">Sony Computer Entertainment</a>. The game utilizes the <a href="PlayStation%20Move">PlayStation Move</a> controller for dancing.
Reception.
"Everybody Dance" received mixed reviews from critics upon release. On <a href="Metacritic">Metacritic</a>, the game holds a score of 66/100 based on 5 reviews.
